tokens.resolved_gloss: good (as an adjective) in the widest sense; used likewise as a noun, both in the masculine and the feminine, the singular and the plural (good, a good or good thing, a good man or woman; the good, goods or good things, good men or women), also as an adverb (well)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to miss; hence (figuratively and generally) to sin; by inference, to forfeit, lack, expiate, repent, (causatively) lead astray, condemn

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, united, i.e. one; or (as an ordinal) first

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)
